metadata.description: Celebrating 50 years of Marvel's First Family! This issue spotlights a Future Foundation bio, an update on the Fantastic Four and an entry on the FF's various headquarters! Plus: FF Allies (Artie Maddicks! Alex Power! Roberta the robot receptionist!), FF enemies (Dreadface! Dr. Sun! Mister Miracle!), extraterrestrials (Shalla Bal! Ovoids! De'Lila the Skrull!) and a sampling of the odd beings the FF has encountered (Karisma! Chupacabra! Cauldron!).
metadata.name: FF: 50 Fantastic Years
